attributes.action: stop the free laptop and broadband give away to people who dont work the money would be better spent on protecting our soldiers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is to ask the prime minister to stop the planned give away of 300000 laptop and broadband services. We think the money would be better spent on protecting our soldiers rather than paying for people to sit on a laptop all day instead of looking for a job and doing somthing for the country.If people need to gain internet access there is more cost effective ways than just giving them a laptop and a free internet access.
